summary:
Hugo keeps a resources directory that is used to cache asset pipeline output across builds. 
Running hugo build for the first time processes all static assets to apply any specified transformations1.  Subsequent runs leverage cache in the resources directory to process only what is necessary for a given build...
title: Caching Hugo resources in Forgejo actions

title: A CSS generator for wavy circle shapes

summary:
Fedicache
There’s a well-known design flaw in Mastodon where links included in posts are “unfurled”—that is, Mastodon will visit the link and fetch the page metadata (title, description, a preview image, etc. ).  That’s fine, but the flawed part is that despite posts being federated, the fetched link metadata is not, which means that every server that receives a copy of a post with a link is going to make its own individual request for that same metadata...
title: Fedicache
